languages.text:
Grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer is affected by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, they gain +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until end of combat. Stacks.
languages.original_text:
Дает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +5 при проверках {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждения{/g}.
Каждый раз, когда на владельца действует {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} союзника, он получает +3% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Grants the wielder a +5 bonus to Persuasion tests and +10% cover efficiency.

Grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer is affected by an ally's ability, they gain +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Дает бонус +5 при проверках Убеждения и +10% к эффективности укрытия.
Дает бонус +5 при проверках Убеждения и +10% к эффективности укрытия.

languages.text:
装备者获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}。
每当装备者受到盟友能力影响时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}都会提高3%。此效果可叠加，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
Grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer is affected by an ally's ability, they gain +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}检定中获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}提高10%。

languages.text:
Concede al portador una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +5 a su {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}.
Cuando el portador recibe los efectos de la capacidad de un aliado, gana +3 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text:
Grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer is affected by an ally's ability, they gain +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
Concede al portador una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +5 a su {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}.
Cuando el portador recibe los efectos de la capacidad de un aliado, gana +3 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text:
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}に+5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与える。
使用者が味方のアビリティの効果を受けるたび、戦闘終了までその味方は{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g} +3を獲得する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text:
Grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer is affected by an ally's ability, they gain +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}に+5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与える。
使用者が味方のアビリティの効果を受けるたび、戦闘終了までその味方は{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g} +3を獲得する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: Gewährt dem Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}. Immer wenn der Träger von einer Fähigkeit eines Verbündeten beeinflusst wird, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +3 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text:

traits.locale_text: Gewährt dem Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}. Immer wenn der Träger von einer Fähigkeit eines Verbündeten beeinflusst wird, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +3 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Confère à l'utilisateur un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est sous l'effet d'une capacité d'un allié, il obtient +3 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
